CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.
MOT brings a small baby presumably CHI sibling to the session. The baby sits in the corner of the room in a baby seat during the interaction and is mainly off camera. CHI nickname is Chrissy

u.a: CHI looks in the direction of the camera
MOT face is not visible to the camera . MOT is holding both a carrier with a baby in it and a baby supply bag
MOT walks over to the side of the room and puts down the baby and her bag
MOT kneels down in front of the baby
CHI walks over next to MOT and places her lunch pail down
<aft> CHI turns to face MOT and the baby
MOT looks up at CHI and smiles
CHI puts her hands behind her back . <aft> CHI picks at her nose with one hand and holds the other hand behind her back
<aft> CHI turns toward the camera and then looks around the room
MOT puts something in the baby supply bag
<aft> MOT sits back on her heels
CHI walks over and stands near her lunch pail
MOT raises her hands to indicate the whole room is open for CHI to sit in
CHI cocks her head to one side
CHI raises her arms up in the air
MOT looks over toward something off camera
CHI looks up at a back door of the room
MOT glances up at the back door
MOT points to something on the other side of the room
baby begins to make whining noise
<$=1> MOT points to something on the other side of the room
CHI walks over to the front door of the room
CHI is holding her hand by her face
<bef> CHI puts her face in the crack of the closed door apparently trying to see out of the room
MOT is folding the baby's blanket
CHI looks over at the desk
<aft> CHI puts her hands on her hips
CHI shrugs then looks at MOT then at the floor in front of her
MOT gets on all fours and leans up to CHI face
CHI looks over at something in the corner of the room
CHI puts her hands inside the sides of the overalls that she is wearing
MOT gets up on her knees
MOT walks over to the desk on her knees
CHI falls to her knees at the desk
MOT reaches up for a box on a shelf above the desk
<bef> sharp intake of breath indicating surprise
MOT backs up into the center of the room on her knees
MOT shows the box to CHI
MOT shakes the box then holds it out to CHI
CHI throws her arms out to the sides and shrugs her shoulders
MOT moves back further toward the center of the room
MOT looks up to the ceiling
the baby is babbling softly in the background
CHI kneels next to MOT in front of the box
MOT indicates other side of the box
<aft> MOT moves herself over to the other side
CHI follows MOT and sits on the other side
now MOT and CHI are again seated on the same side of the box

g.ga: on other side of the box

u.a: MOT pats the other side with her hand
CHI begins to get up and move to the other side
<$=1> MOT puts her hand in front of CHI to prevent her from getting up
MOT pats the cover of the box
CHI lifts the lid of the box up
CHI holds the lid up in the air
<$=1> MOT takes the lid from CHI and places it off to the side
CHI reaches out and puts her hand on the book
MOT puts the box off to the side
CHI takes the book out of the box
CHI opens the book on her lap and flips some pages
MOT leans over closer to CHI and looks at the book
<$=1> MOT points at the page in the book
CHI looks down at the book and points at something on the page
MOT points with CHI at the page
<$=1> MOT turns to the front of the book holding one half of it while CHI holds the other half
MOT tries to pull the book onto her lap
CHI pulls the book back to her lap and holds it with both hands
MOT lets go of the book
<$=1> MOT points to the items on the page as she reads
<$=1> MOT points to something on the page
CHI looks at the item MOT is pointing at
MOT points to something at the bottom of the page
CHI leans closer to the book to see the picture
MOT picks up the corner of the page
CHI puts her other hand on the book and holds it open
CHI turns the page as MOT points to it
CHI holds the page as if to turn it
<aft> CHI pauses and looks at the pictures on the page
MOT points to the picture of a seesaw on the page
MOT points to a picture on the page
CHI looks at the picture at which MOT points
MOT points at another picture on the page
the baby is beginning to make louder noises making it difficult to hear the interactions between MOT and CHI
<6-10> MOT drags box so it rests in front of CHI
<bef> CHI pulls the book closer to look at the picture
MOT points at the page again
evidently the page MOT points at is a night scene and the facing page is a morning scene
<3-4> CHI points to the page with the moring scene
<$=1> MOT points to the page of the night scene
<bef> CHI pulls the book closer to her face to look at the night scene page
MOT puts the book back in the box
CHI gets up and walks over to the desk
MOT pushes the box off to the side
CHI turns around and looks at MOT
CHI is off camera trying to get another activity box
CHI walks over to where MOT is kneeling and puts the box down
MOT puts her hand on the box
CHI lifts up the lid of the box
CHI pauses and holds the lid up in the air
CHI looks down into the box
MOT takes the lid from CHI and places it off to the side
the box has two hand puppets in it
CHI picks up a Cookie_Monster puppet
Cookie Monster is a character on a children's television show called Sesame Street
CHI picks up the other puppet and puts the Cookie Monster puppet down in the box
MOT leans forward looking closely at CHI
CHI puts both puppets down in the box
MOT puts a puppet on her hand
CHI looks around the room for the lid of the box
MOT reaches back to get the lid of the box and she holds it vertically to block her arm
MOT imitates Cookie Monster's scratchy voice
MOT peeks the puppet from behind the lid she is holding and leans the puppet closer and closer to CHI
MOT uses Cookie Monster voice again
Chrissy is a nickname for Christina
CHI tries to get the puppet onto her hand
CHI is looking up a the Cookie Monster puppet
MOT lifts the puppet up from behind the lid to adjust it
CHI uses high pitched voice for her puppet .
CHI puts her puppet's face together with that of the Cookie Monster puppet
CHI still mashes the face of her puppet into that of Cookie Monster puppet
CHI sits back on her heels and takes the puppet off of her hand
CHI sits up and reaches for Cookie Monster
MOT offers Cookie Monster to CHI
CHI stands up and takes Cookie Monster off of MOT hand
CHI puts Cookie Monster on her hand
MOT puts Goldie on her hand
MOT moves Goldie around in the air toward CHI face
CHI holds Cookie Monster up on her hand
<$=3> MOT speaks in high pitched voice
<$=3> MOT moves Goldie puppet close to CHI face and tries not to move her lips as she talks
CHI looks at the Cookie Monster puppet then at the camera
CHI puts her hand on MOT shoulder
Big_Bird is another character on Sesame Street
CHI looks at the Cookie Monster puppet
MOT drops Goldie onto her lap
MOT leans over into CHI face
CHI still looks at Cookie Monster
MOT uses high pitched voice and elongates the first syllable of the word cookie
MOT brings Goldie up to talk to the Cookie Monster puppet
CHI puts her hand into Goldie's mouth
<bef> CHI looks at MOT then at Goldie
MOT pretends to bite CHI hand with the Goldie puppet
CHI pulls her hand out of Goldie's mouth
<3 , 5 .> MOT pecks CHI hand with the Goldie puppet
CHI takes Cookie Monster off her hand and holds it out to MOT
MOT pretends that Goldie is flying toward CHI
<aft> MOT holds Goldie in front of CHI face
<4-7> CHI takes Goldie from MOT hand and puts it on her own hand
MOT takes Cookie Monster puppet with her other hand
MOT looks down at Cookie Monster puppet on her hand
CHI uses low voice for Goldie
<bef> CHI walks toward MOT working the puppet's mouth
<$=2> MOT uses low voice for Cookie Monster
<$=2> MOT holds up Cookie Monster puppet
CHI turns and walks toward the table
CHI pretends that Goldie picks up some cookies off the desk
<aft> CHI turns and walks back over to MOT
MOT puts Cookie Monster back into the box
CHI looks down into the box
CHI bends down and grabs Cookie Monster in the box
CHI takes Goldie off of her hand and puts it in the box then stands up
<$=1> MOT puts the lid on the box
MOT puts the box off to the side
CHI walks over to the desk and grabs the box on top of it
<aft> CHI looks back at MOT over her shoulder
MOT pauses and looks at CHI
CHI still looks back at MOT over her shoulder
CHI picks up the box and brings it over to where MOT is kneeling on the floor
CHI lifts off the box lid
MOT looks down at box and then up at CHI
CHI looks up at MOT then down at the crayons and paper that are in the box
CHI kneels down in front of the box
MOT moves closer to CHI and box
CHI reaches into the box and takes some crayons
<1-2> MOT pulls the box closer to herself
CHI picks a piece of paper up out of the box and places it on the floor
MOT moves the box out of CHI way
CHI looks at the crayons in her hand
MOT reaches out and taps the floor twice
MOT clears the box lid out of the way
CHI gets up and walks over toward the desk then turns and walks to where MOT is clearing a space on the floor
MOT taps the cleared floor space twice
CHI walks by the cleared floor space and sits over where MOT piled the box and lid
MOT taps the cleared floor space again
MOT looks up at camera then over at CHI
MOT looks up at the camera again
where CHI presently sits is not in the camera view
CHI looks down at the crayons in her hand
MOT moves the box and lid out of CHI way
CHI bends over and begins to draw
CHI is not in camera view
MOT is stretched out on her stomach on the floor
a light knocking heard from INV viewing window indicates that CHI is not in camera view
MOT reaches out for CHI and the paper
MOT slides the paper over to where it is in camera view
CHI gets up on her knees and moves to where MOT has placed the paper
MOT moves over on her stomach
CHI stretches out on her stomach also
<$=1> CHI draws something on the paper
MOT reaches up and grabs a piece of paper
MOT puts her face closer to CHI
<2> CHI looks up from her paper at MOT
MOT holds her crayon above the paper as if she is about to draw
CHI hunches up on her knees
CHI begins to draw a circle on her paper
CHI completes her circle and draws her hand away
MOT pushes herself up on her elbows
CHI gets up on her knees picking up her paper off the floor
MOT looks back over her shoulder at CHI
CHI flips over her paper and begins to put it down back onto the floor
MOT takes the paper from CHI and flips it back to the side that CHI drew on
MOT straightens the paper on the floor
MOT offers her crayon to CHI
CHI draws two eyes then sits up
<aft> CHI bends over and starts drawing again
CHI glances up at MOT paper then at MOT
CHI sits back on her heels
CHI puts the crayon in her left hand
CHI leans over to switch crayons with MOT
CHI puts another crayon down for MOT to use
CHI calls baby a name that sounds like Jerry
<$=1> CHI turns and talks to the baby
<aft> CHI draws two lines on the paper then sits up
CHI sits with her arms folded and looks at MOT
<$=1> MOT writes ABCs on her paper
MOT looks down at her paper
<bef> CHI glances over her shoulder then turns and looks back at MOT
MOT leans over as if to draw on CHI paper
MOT reaches over to CHI crayon
CHI presses too hard on the crayon and the tip of it slid into its paper wrapper
CHI examines the tip of the crayon
MOT writes something on the bottom of CHI paper
CHI pushes the crayon so the tip is out of the wrapper
CHI watches the crayon tip as it emerges from the wrapper
CHI tries to take the crayon's wrapper off
MOT looks down to her paper
CHI drops the crayon onto MOT paper
MOT hands the crayon to CHI
CHI takes the crayon from MOT
CHI takes bends over and draws on the paper then sits up
<$=1> MOT moves over and readjusts herself in front over her paper
<aft> CHI lies out on her stomach
CHI looks at MOT name written on her paper
CHI points at MOT name on the paper
baby is crying off camera making it difficult to hear the interaction
MOT points at the name on the paper
CHI brings her crayon back over to her own paper
<aft> CHI looks down at her paper
CHI points to the corner of MOT paper
MOT begins writing in the corner
<aft> CHI writes up in the corner of her own paper
evidently MOT wrote CHI name in the corner of the paper and CHI recognized it
MOT looks at CHI out of the corner of her eye
CHI looks up at MOT then up toward desk
MOT gets up off her stomach
MOT leans closer to CHI as she gets up
CHI stands up picking up her paper
CHI walks over to the box and puts her paper away
MOT puts her paper back in the box
<$=1> MOT slides the box over to herself and covers it
CHI gets up to get the fourth box
<aft> MOT walks over to where CHI is standing at the desk
there is a lot of background noise coming both from outside the room and from the baby . MOT and CHI are off camera
<aft> CHI walks over to where MOT has put the box on the floor
MOT puts the box on the floor
both MOT and CHI are in camera view
CHI sits in front of the box and lifts up one of the flaps
CHI crouches to see what is inside the box
MOT looks over at the baby who is whimpering
CHI sits back and pulls her hand out from the box
<bef> MOT grabs the box to get a better grip on it
CHI gets up and tries to pick up the box to turn it on its end
MOT tips the box so the toys would slide out then puts it down again
MOT tries to get the toy out of the box
CHI stands in front of the box and looks down at the box
<$=1> MOT pulls the toy house out of the box
Fisher Price is the toy manufacturer who makes the toy house
<bef> CHI sits in front of the house
<$=1> MOT adujusts herself to sit in front of the house with CHI
<bef> MOT rings the doorbell on the house
CHI leans and looks in the top floor of the house
MOT looks into the top floor of the house
the house is closed so only the outside is visible
CHI moves to the front of the house
the baby is whining in the background
CHI reaches up and touches the toy people who are sitting in the top floor windows of the house
CHI leans close to the house
MOT sits sideways and puts her hand on top of the house near where the latch to open it is
CHI moves to the side to see the inside of the house
MOT angles the house so the camera view is better
some furniture and a car fall out of the house as MOT moves it
MOT looks down at the house
CHI picks up some of the furniture that has fallen out of the house
CHI puts the bed in a downstairs room
MOT looks closely into the house
CHI pauses and holds the bed up
CHI puts the bed in an upstairs room
MOT readjusts herself as she lies on the floor
CHI is moving things around and placing them in different rooms in the house
the camera moves off to the side in order to improve the view of the inside the house .
CHI moves the chair into the kitchen of the house
<$=2> MOT points to something in CHI hand
CHI pushes the car backwards into the house
some objects to which CHI and MOT refer are not visible
<aft> CHI gets up from lying on her stomach
MOT reaches over and lifts up the garage door
MOT points at the empty car
CHI leans forward and puts a person in the car
CHI gets another person out of the house and puts him in the car
CHI drives the toy car into the garage
CHI takes the car out of the garage
CHI moves forward and picks up a person in the house while holding the car in her other hand
MOT points to the car in CHI hand
MOT pretends the car is real and jokes with CHI about holding the car in her hand
<aft> MOT takes the car from CHI hand and puts it on the floor
MOT pushes the car halfway into the garage
CHI leans forward and puts the person that she holds back in the house
CHI pushes the car the rest of the way into the garage
CHI tries to close the garage door
<$=1> MOT reaches over and pulls the house toward herself while trying to close the garage
MOT closes the garage door partially
<$=1> MOT pushes the house back over to CHI
<bef> CHI closes the garage the rest of the way
the baby is crying in the background
CHI leans forward and looks in the house
MOT indicated the house with her hand
CHI points to the living room of the house

MOT points into the living room
evidently CHI pointed to the fireplace
CHI reaches into the bed+room and picks up a bed
CHI moves the bed to another room in the house

MOT is attending to the baby

MOT is picking up the baby
